snippet.title: Sparticles Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Sparticles is a fast-paced platformer about using colorful particles to uncover your surroundings.


Sparticles has a similar feel to hardcore platformers like Super Meat Boy. The object of each level is to defeat all of the enemies in the room (if any) and reach the goal. However, the terrain is invisible to the player. The player can discover terrain by physically bumping into it, or by performing a double jump or making a dash.

Steam : https://store.steampowered.com/app/915930/Sparticles/
